boardgame.name: Yggdrasil
boardgame.description: Yggdrasil is a co-operative game in which players are different gods of the Norse mythology: Odin, Thor, Tyr, Frey, Heimdall and Freyja. Monsters, the wolf Fenrir, the huge serpent Jormungand, the Fire Giant Surt, the Goddess of the Dead Hel, the traitor Loki and the cosmic dragon Nidh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ouml;gg are moving forward in Asgard inescapably and announce the impending coming of chaos and destruction on the world-tree Yggdrasil. Together the players have to resist to the impending coming of the Evil forces in Asgard, the gods' world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game flow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During his turn, the active player first draws an Enemy card, corresponding to one of the six Evil creatures. The corresponding counter is moved one space forward in Asgard and the associated effect applies. Then the active player performs three different actions among the nine at his disposal in order to resist to the advance:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Ask for the Elves' help_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Get (or improve) a Weapon from the Dwarves_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Send the Valkyries looking for Vikings' souls on the mankind world of Midgard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fight the Fire Giants and try to gather the parts of a magic rune_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Negotiate with the Vanir_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Get rid of the Fire Giants who invade Midgard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Get the Vikings back from Hel's world_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Exchange forces with another god_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fight against the Enemies in Asgard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player, depending on the god he plays, has a specific power that allows him to perform some actions better. All of these actions have to be used at the right moment or the victory will be unreachable. The players will need cleverness, calm, and team spirit to challenge the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Zman Games - Yggdrasil Language: English Players: 2-4 Age: 13+ Duration: about 90 min. Weight: 1.100 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Yggdrasil, the “terrible steed”, a cosmic ash tree that supports the nine worlds, is in jeopardy. As the Ragnarök approaches, you, mighty among the Æsir and Vanir Gods, have to face the relentless advance of Evil Forces. You must sacrifice everything to prevent Evil from destroying Yggdrasil. The last battle, predicted since the dawn of time, is starting now. Your only aim is to repel the Evil Forces in order for Yggdrasil to survive this universe at war. Yggdrasil is a co-operative game with many different difficulty levels which requires all your team spirit and your brain power. Play the Norse Gods and take up the Ragnarök challenge. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Due to continuing storage problems, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m regularly selling (least-played) games from my personal collection. I did like all the games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling , but with 200+ board and card games there are always other (comparable) contenders that just speak to me more. And besides, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m a real collector, always trying to perfect my collection with games I only like best (at that moment in time). The low pricing, therefore, is simple (if you were wondering): I just want to make other people happy for a few bucks/euros. Enabling me to purchase a new game every four or five orders. This game - Yggdrasil - has been played 4 times at the most, after having bought it second-hand in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Like New_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; condition myself.
